english: Mr. ford : good afternoon , mrs. davis .
chinese: 福特先生：下午好，戴维斯夫人。

english: Good afternoon , what can i do for you , sir ?
chinese: 下午好，先生，你需要什么？

english: Good afternoon , a table for two , please .
chinese: 下午好，请安排供两个人就餐的桌子。

english: Good afternoon , i would like to change some chinese money , please .
chinese: 下午好。我要换一些人民币，可以吗？
下午好造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Mr. hill : good afternoon . i believe that this house is for sale .
chinese: 希尔先生：下午好，我想这房子是出售的吧？

english: Afternoon , mr . president . - oh , hello , handy
chinese: 总统先生，下午好-噢，你好，汉迪

english: Good afternoon . my name is natalie vanderpark
chinese: 下午好我的名字是纳塔丽范得帕克

english: Man : good afternoon . i want to see my daughter
chinese: 男：下午好。我想看看我的女儿。

english: Dean : good afternoon . what ' s your name , please
chinese: 迪安：下午好。请问你叫什么名字？

english: You ' re from the sceptical examiner ! oh ! afternoon
chinese: 你是好奇报社派来的吗？下午好

english: Good afternoon , sir , i ' m glad to see you again
chinese: 先生，下午好，很高兴再次见到您。

english: Mrs . brown : good afternoon , tom . how are you
chinese: 布朗太太：下午好，汤姆。你好吗？

english: Good afternoon , mr . driftwood . - good afternoon
chinese: 下午好,吉夫伍德先生. -下午好

english: Good afternoon . could i speak to mr . smith , please
chinese: 下午好。我找史密斯先生。
